attributes.action: Ban Sharia Law in the UK and make it a criminal offence to practice it.
attributes.background: Sharia Law has no place in the UK, yet there are many people practicing it and even Sharia Law Courts set up in the UK.  This petition calls for Sharia Law to be banned in the UK and anyone found to be practicing it to receive a lengthy prison sentence.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107864

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
